title: What was Apple announced in the CES 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple made an official return to CES for the first time in decades. The company didn’t attend to pitch a new product but to instead talk about consumer privacy. Jane Horvath, Apple's Senior Director of Privacy, spoke at "Chief Privacy Officer Roundtable: What Do Consumers Want?" event at the conference on Tuesday, January 7.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Tharun Kumar Ravikrindhi
